content: @WG-prioritization issue #71297 has been requested for prioritization.

This only happens in a "failing path", so according to our (new!) priority definitions, this should be P-low. However this is a beta regression and the release is in less than a week, so should we bump it to P-medium?
It won't get into beta anyway I think

This will reach stable on Tuesday, so it's probably not getting a fix before that. However, or-patterns are still unstable anyways, so it's unlikely that a user will try to write code like this on stable (the bug was found via fuzzing).
